Rulings.Base:
1. If you Special Summon this card correctly, it can later be Special Summoned back from the GY.
2. The effect to send monsters to the GY and increase this card's ATK targets the monsters to be sent to the GY.
3. You can activate the effect to send monsters to the GY and increase this card's ATK when this card is Special Summoned by another card effect, like "Monster Reborn".
4. The ATK gained by "Meklord Astro Dragon Asterisk" is the total original ATK of the monsters sent to the GY by this effect.
5. The effect to inflict damage activates any time a Synchro Monster is Special Summoned, including by the effect of "Blackwing - Vayu the Emblem of Honor" or "Monster Reborn".
6. If both players Summon a Synchro Monster due to the same effect, they both take 1000 damage from this effect.
7. If this card is affected by "Shrink", its ATK becomes 0 and remains 0 after "Shrink" wears off.
8. If this card is affected by "Megamorph" its ATK becomes 0. If "Megamorph" leaves the field, this card regains the ATK it gained from its own effect.

PSCT.Base: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by controlling 3 or more "Meklord" monsters. When this card is Special Summoned: You can target any number of "Meklord" monsters you control, except this card; send those targets to the Graveyard, and if you do, this card's ATK becomes the combined original ATK of the monsters sent to the Graveyard by this effect. Each time a Synchro Monster(s) is Special Summoned: Inflict 1000 damage to the Summoning player.
